title: Hero MotoCorp halts booking for India-made Harley Davidson
description: Hero MotoCorp Ltd. on Tuesday halted bookings for its India-made Harley-Davidson motorcycle. The company has received 25,597 bookings for the Harley-Davidson X440 till date. Hero called the demand "overwhelming", as per a Bloomberg report.
